def expected_days_until_happy(n: int, p: list) -> int:
    m = 998244354
    probb = 100
    num = 0
    for (i, p_i) in enumerate(p, 1):
        probu = (100 - p_i) * probb % m
        probb = p_i * probb % m
        num = (num * 100 + i * probu) % m
    num = (num + n * probb) % m
    return num * pow(probb, m - 2, m) % m
